entities.name: cormac mclaggen
entities.description: Cormac McLaggen is mentioned as the one who almost became Gryffindor Keeper. He is also referred to as a Quidditch player.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as having a most un-Hermione-ish giggle and liking really good Quidditch players.

entities.name: parvati
entities.description: Parvati is mentioned as being wide-eyed and looking agog at the gossip about Hermione and Cormac McLaggen.

entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum is mentioned as one of Hermione's previous Quidditch players she liked.

entities.name: lavender
entities.description: Lavender is mentioned as being present with Parvati when they discuss the gossip about Hermione and Cormac McLaggen.

relationships.description: Hermione is going out with Cormac McLaggen, as mentioned in the conversation between Hermione and Parvati.
Parvati is friends with Hermione, as evidenced by their conversation about Cormac McLaggen.
